# n8n_workflow_transfer (Resource)

Transfers a workflow to another project. This is a one-time operation resource that triggers the transfer when created.

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->

## Schema

### Required

- `destination_project_id` (String) ID of the destination project
- `workflow_id` (String) ID of the workflow to transfer

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Resource identifier (generated)
- `transferred_at` (String) Timestamp when the transfer occurred
